      • blur

        public CdnPathBuilder blur(int strength)
        Performs Gaussian blur on result image.
        Parameters:
        strength - Strength is standard deviation (aka blur radius) multiplied by ten. Strength can be up to 5000. Default is 10.

      • sharp

        public CdnPathBuilder sharp()
        Performs sharpening on result image. This can be useful after scaling down.

      • sharp

        public CdnPathBuilder sharp(int strength)
        Performs sharpening on result image. This can be useful after scaling down.
        Parameters:
        strength - Strength can be from 0 to 20. Default is 5.

      • format

        public CdnPathBuilder format(java.lang.String format)
        Turn an image to one of the following formats: FORMAT_JPEG or FORMAT_PNG.
        Parameters:
        format - CdnPathBuilder.ImageFormat either FORMAT_JPEG or FORMAT_PNG.

      • quality

        public CdnPathBuilder quality(java.lang.String quality)
        Image quality affects size of image and loading speed. Has no effect on non-JPEG images, but does not force format to JPEG.
        Parameters:
        quality - QUALITY_NORMAL – used by default. Fine in most cases. QUALITY_BETTER – can be used on relatively small previews with lots of details. ≈125% file size compared to normal image. QUALITY_BEST – useful if you're a photography god and you want to get perfect quality without paying attention to size. ≈170% file size. QUALITY_LIGHTER – can be used on relatively large images to save traffic without significant quality loss. ≈80% file size. QUALITY_LIGHTEST — useful for retina resolutions, when you don't wory about quality of each pixel. ≈50% file size.

      • build

        public java.lang.String build()
        Returns the current CDN path as a string. Avoid using directly. Instead, pass the configured builder to a URL factory.
        Returns:
        CDN path
        See Also:
        Urls.cdn(CdnPathBuilder)
